scripts.compile: yarn clean && node -r ts-node/register scripts/cli.js compile -c yToken && yarn compile-lambda -t ytoken && node -r ts-node/register scripts/cli.js compile -c priceFeed && node -r ts-node/register scripts/cli.js compile -c interestRate && node -r ts-node/register scripts/cli.js compile -c getInterests && node -r ts-node/register scripts/cli.js compile -c fa12 && node -r ts-node/register scripts/cli.js compile -c fa2
scripts.migrate: yarn compile && node -r ts-node/register scripts/cli.js migrate
scripts.migrate-gra: yarn compile && node -r ts-node/register scripts/cli.js migrate --network granadanet
scripts.migrate-hang: yarn compile && node -r ts-node/register scripts/cli.js migrate --network hangzhounet
scripts.migrate-s: yarn compile && node -r ts-node/register scripts/cli.js migrate --network development_server
scripts.start-sandbox: docker run --rm --name my-sandbox -e flextesa_node_cors_origin='*' -e block_time=1 --detach -p 8732:20000 oxheadalpha/flextesa:20211221 hangzbox start
